step.name: Preprocessing
step.description: Image data is padded to multiples of 8 and converted from RGB to YCbCr.

step.name: DCT
step.description: Forward DCT converts spatial data to frequency domain.

step.name: Quantization
step.description: Frequency coefficients are divided by quantization tables to reduce precision.

step.name: ZigZag
step.description: 2D block is flattened to 1D array in zigzag order.

step.name: Entropy Coding
step.description: Run-length encoding and Huffman coding are applied.

step.name: File Assembly
step.description: Headers (SOI, DQT, SOF0, DHT, SOS) and scan data are combined into the final JPEG file.

feature.name: Baseline JPEG
feature.description: Standard sequential DCT-based JPEG encoding and decoding.

feature.name: Progressive JPEG
feature.description: Multi-scan progressive encoding and decoding support.

feature.name: Multi-File Sharding
feature.description: Data splitting across multiple JPEG files.

feature.name: BitReader Variants
feature.description: Multiple BitReader implementations for performance tuning.
